request.lesson_description: An introduction to the major world religions: Christianity, Islam, Judaism, Hinduism, and Buddhism. Understanding their core beliefs, practices, and cultural impact.
request.learning_standard: NCSS.D2.HIS.14.6-8: Explain multiple causes and effects of events and developments in the past, including the influence of religion on societies.
request.additional_guidance: Focus on comparing similarities and differences between the religions. Include real-world examples of their influence on art, literature, and culture.
